item.title: Bitcoin Price Finding Support?
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Finding Support?

Bitcoin price dropped back toward $660, overnight, but now seems to be engaged in a sideways base formation. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member? Join now.

item.title: Bitmain Antminer R4 Review - Mine Bitcoins at Home
item.description:
Bitmain Antminer R4 Review - Mine Bitcoins at Home

Probably one of the most asked questions regarding Bitcoin mining in the past few years was "Is Bitcoin mining profitable?" In 99% of the cases the answer is no, since competition is too fierce and in order to mine profitably you'll need a dedicated ASIC mining rig.

item.title: Building the Foundations for a Scalable Ethereum - CoinDesk
item.description:
Building the Foundations for a Scalable Ethereum - CoinDesk

In this opinion piece, Stark discusses the nature of blockchain communities, indicating that he believes current "problems" observed in blockchain governance may need to be better observed before they can be understood. Recent events have forced ethereum's community to the forefront.

item.title: Fintech Ecosystem Report: Blockchain, the Trump Card for Financial Evolution - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Fintech Ecosystem Report: Blockchain, the Trump Card for Financial Evolution - NEWSBTC

A recent report on the evolution of fintech calls Blockchain technology as the trump card with a potential to change the way financial systems work today. Read more... Since Bitcoin became popular, it has been hailed as the revolutionary technology that is going to change the financial landscape of the world.

item.title: 4 Blockchain Companies Focusing On Secure Digital Identity Solutions
item.description:
4 Blockchain Companies Focusing On Secure Digital Identity Solutions

Various blockchain startups are focusing on bringing digital identities to the table. Creating a more secure environment for personal information is direly needed. With the number of data breaches on the rise, better solutions have to be created. Some of these firms are even seeing a spectacular growth already.

item.title: Humankind Evolution: Liberté, Égalité, Chaîne de Blocs
item.description:
Humankind Evolution: Liberté, Égalité, Chaîne de Blocs

These days, blockchain ceased being a mere computer technology with limited scope of applications, but a sort of a philosophic concept applicable anywhere in human society. In particular, it may be successfully implemented in state building and reformation of both governance systems and the society in general.

What's wrong with being direct and blunt? Nothing, as long as you are also compassionate. In fact, direct communication is far superior to indirect or passive communication. Problem is, a lot of folks confuse "direct and blunt" with "being an asshole and deliberately saying hurtful things." Don't do that and you're fine.

item.title: What do you think of bitcoin/blockchain in general and the 21 platform in particular?
item.description:
What do you think of bitcoin/blockchain in general and the 21 platform in particular?

Theres a lot of answers already, and I'm not sure I fully understand the question, but here it goes. My own poor dietary choices. I was (and still am to a degree) a bit over weight as a kid. Not massively, but I was certainly large.
